name: Flip Flop (Zineddine/Sith)
description:
Flip Flop is a simple game for everyone. It contains a single player mode and a two player mode

1. Extract the .zip file

2. Open the extracted folder

3. Launch the "FlipFlop1.exe" file

4. Enjoy ! 

1. Extrayez le fichier .zip

2. Ouvrez le dossier extrait

3. Lancez le fichier "FlipFlop1.exe"

4. Profitez du jeu !


Credit : 
Zineddine Nouari
